definition[0]: to end an argument because you want to stay friendly with someone
example[0]: Try to patch up your differences before he leaves.
example[1]: He went back to patch things up with his wife.
definition[1]: to repair a hole in something by putting a piece of something else over it
example[2]: We’ll have to patch up the hole in the roof.
definition[2]: to give quick and basic medical treatment to someone who is hurt
example[3]: We patched up the wounded as best we could.
